channel.title: Command help
channel.description: How can i make it so that someone cant use a command more than once?

item.title: Command help
item.dc:creator: @Modtacular Modtacular
item.description:
@Modtacular wrote:

[quote=“ChemicalReaction™, post:2, topic:147681”]like a starter?
you need to make a starter log and make the command read it …etc…[/quote]

oh

thanks man[br][size=1]Posted on: September 30, 2007, 12:09:03 PM[/size][hr]sry for double, put i tried a different method i saw in the code somewhere else

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter")) { if (gotstrt == 0) { gotstrt = 1; addItem(995,10000000); addItem(6605,1); addItem(4708,1); addItem(4712,1); addItem(4714,1); addItem(6585,1); } else sendMessage("YOU ALREADY GOT YOUR STARTER KIT U GREEDY BASTARD!"); }

in compiler it says that gotstrt isnt a symbol, but the code i based this off of had its own “symbol”

i based it off of

else if (NPCID == 1835) { // Easterbunny pmgz!! if (hasegg == 0) { hasegg = 1; addItem(4565, 1); } else sendMessage("YOU ALREADY HAVE YOUR BASKET YOU GREEDY SLUT!"); }

help?

Read full topic
